attributes.action: take immediate action against all of the people speaking out against UK citizens in the Channel 4 Dispatches programme that was aired this week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would ask that the Prime Minister instructs the Home Office / Police to arrest all of these people immediately. To detain them and to investigate whether what they have been "preaching" in these mosques is in fact illegal and to act accordingly. So that these people cannot be allowed to say these things and to go unchallenged.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
